mng: to support, to sustain, to erect, to raise, branch, division, to draw money, classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

exm.mng: to be in favor of, to support, to back, support, backing, to stand by
to provide assistance, to support, to back
to prop up, to support, strut, brace
branch, esp. grass root branches of a political party
branch (of company, river etc), to branch, to diverge, to ramify, to subdivide
to control, to dominate, to allocate
